author: Opinion by Emily Liu
title: Covid-19 has inflamed racism against Asian-Americans. Here's how to fight back
description: While most Americans are struggling amid the Covid-19 pandemic, Asian Americans are doing it while also fearing for our safety, says Emily Liu. It's not easy in this climate of xenophobia, Liu observes; she offers practical advice on how to curb the toxic eff…
content: Emily Liu is an associate director of employer relations at Emory University's Goizueta Business School based in Atlanta. A native of Rochester, New York, she is a lawyer and an Executive Board member of the Atlanta Diversity Management Advocacy Group (ADMAG)… [+7547 chars]
